Uses of Package
de.mrapp.android.sidebar

  • Packages that use de.mrapp.android.sidebar 
    Package Description
    de.mrapp.android.sidebar  
    de.mrapp.android.sidebar.animation  
    de.mrapp.android.sidebar.savedstate  
    de.mrapp.android.sidebar.view  
  • Classes in de.mrapp.android.sidebar used by de.mrapp.android.sidebar 
    Class and Description
    ContentMode
    Contains all possible content modes, which specify how a sidebar's content view is handled when the sidebar becomes shown or hidden.
    DragMode
    Contains all possible drag modes, which can be applied on a sidebar to specify, on which regions dragging should be recognized.
    Location
    Contains all possible locations of a sidebar.
    Sidebar
    A custom view, which allows to show a sidebar, which overlaps the view's main content and can be shown or hidden in an animated manner.
    SidebarListener
    Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified when a sidebar becomes shown or hidden, must implement.
  • Classes in de.mrapp.android.sidebar used by de.mrapp.android.sidebar.animation 
    Class and Description
    Location
    Contains all possible locations of a sidebar.
  • Classes in de.mrapp.android.sidebar used by de.mrapp.android.sidebar.savedstate 
    Class and Description
    ContentMode
    Contains all possible content modes, which specify how a sidebar's content view is handled when the sidebar becomes shown or hidden.
    DragMode
    Contains all possible drag modes, which can be applied on a sidebar to specify, on which regions dragging should be recognized.

  • Classes in de.mrapp.android.sidebar used by de.mrapp.android.sidebar.view
